course.name: C Course
course.description: Interactive C programming course covering fundamentals, pointers, memory management, data structures, and systems programming. Based on K&R, King's "A Modern Approach", Gustedt's "Modern C", and Seacord's "Effective C".
course.status: Coming soon â€” content is being written

modules.title: C Quick Reference
modules.description: Compiler setup, gcc/clang flags, common errors, printf format specifiers, and quick syntax lookup.

modules.title: Hello World & Compilation
modules.description: Your first C program, the compilation pipeline (preprocessor, compiler, assembler, linker), and using gcc.

modules.title: Types & Operators
modules.description: Integer and floating-point types, sizeof, type conversions, arithmetic and logical operators, precedence.

modules.title: Control Flow
modules.description: if/else, switch, while, for, do-while, break, continue, goto, and structured programming idioms.

modules.title: Functions & Scope
modules.description: Function declarations and definitions, pass-by-value, scope rules, storage classes (auto, static, extern, register).

modules.title: Arrays & Strings
modules.description: Array declaration and initialization, multidimensional arrays, C strings, string.h functions, buffer safety.

modules.title: Pointers
modules.description: Pointer basics, address-of and dereference operators, NULL, pointer-to-pointer, and function pointers.

modules.title: Pointer Arithmetic & Arrays
modules.description: Pointer arithmetic, array-pointer equivalence, pointer to arrays, const correctness with pointers.

modules.title: Structs, Unions & Enums
modules.description: Defining and using structs, nested structs, unions, enums, typedef, and bit-fields.

modules.title: Dynamic Memory
modules.description: malloc, calloc, realloc, free, memory leaks, dangling pointers, and valgrind basics.

modules.title: File I/O
modules.description: fopen, fclose, fread, fwrite, fprintf, fscanf, binary vs text mode, and error handling with errno.

modules.title: Preprocessor
modules.description: #include, #define, macros with arguments, conditional compilation, #pragma, include guards, and macro pitfalls.

modules.title: Multi-file Projects & Makefiles
modules.description: Header files, separate compilation, linking, Makefiles, build targets, and dependency management.

modules.title: Debugging & Undefined Behavior
modules.description: GDB basics, sanitizers (ASan, UBSan), common UB categories, sequence points, and strict aliasing.

modules.title: Bitwise Operations
modules.description: Bitwise AND, OR, XOR, NOT, shifts, bit masks, flag manipulation, and portable bit tricks.

modules.title: Advanced Data Structures
modules.description: Linked lists, stacks, queues, hash tables, and trees implemented in C with dynamic memory.

modules.title: Concurrency
modules.description: POSIX threads, mutexes, condition variables, C11 threads and atomics, and common concurrency pitfalls.

modules.title: Systems Programming
modules.description: Process creation (fork/exec), signals, pipes, sockets basics, and interacting with the OS.

projects.title: RPN Calculator
projects.description: Build a stack-based RPN calculator using arrays, strings, and pointers. A classic K&R exercise.

projects.title: Student Database
projects.description: Build a CRUD student database with file persistence using structs, dynamic memory, and file I/O.

projects.title: Mini Shell
projects.description: Build a command-line shell with parsing, fork/exec, and pipelines. A Stanford/CMU classic.

projects.title: Memory Allocator
projects.description: Implement a custom malloc/free allocator. The capstone project, inspired by CMU's malloc lab.
